name: Little Nova
description:
Little Nova : Unstable Path - Ludum dare 49 The theme Unstable translates into an environment full of traps, mind your steps!

… and thats basically it, the game is very short (40sec when I run through it, maybe 2 to 3 min for a new player).

Brief Lore Explaination: In the game you explore the mental world of the little girl you play. She is actually blind and is also a seer (sort of), the world she perceives is dark but her 3rd eye can see the path she can walk on in the form of marked divination cards..

Play with: WASD or ZQSD (move), Space button (3rd eye vision), Mouse (cards interactions).

Audio Credits: Little Nightmare Ost + SFX made in youtube
